DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , pharmacokinetics , 4-week rapid virologic response ( RVR ) 3 different dos ABT-267 ( also know ombitasvir ) combination pegylated interferon/ribavirin ( pegIFN/RBV ) compare pegIFN/RBV alone ( ABT-267 placebo ) treatment naïve , hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) , genotype 1-infected participant .
DOC.brief_title: Study ABT-267 Treatment Naive Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) Genotype 1 Infected Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The study randomize , double blind , placebo control study consist 2 substudies . In substudy 1 , participant receive 1 3 dos ABT-267 placebo + pegIFN/RBV 12 week . In substudy 2 , participant receive pegIFN/RBV 36 week . Participants follow 48 week post ABT-267 treatment evaluation efficacy safety .
DOC.criteria: Treatment naïve participant Females must either postmenopausal least 2 year surgically sterile Males must surgically sterile practice specific form birth control Chronic hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) , genotype1 infected participant Documented FibroTest score combination Aspartate Aminotransferase Platelet Ratio Index ( APRI ) , liver biopsy within last 12 month document absence cirrhosis Pregnant breastfeed female Use medication contraindicate use pegylated interferon ( pegIFN ) ribavirin ( RBV ) 2 week prior study drug administration 10 halflives , whichever longer Clinically significant cardiac , respiratory ( except mild asthma ) , renal , gastrointestinal , hematologic , neurologic disease , uncontrolled medical illness psychiatric disease disorder Current past clinical evidence cirrhosis bridge fibrosis Abnormal screen laboratory result
